column4: Hi all, ive installed Ubuntu 9.10 a while ago and after ive installed "E17-Enlightenment" my "Gnome Network Manager Applet" was replaced by another one, which isnt compatible to ndiswrapper
Is there a possibilty to reinstall the Network-Manager-Applet over the Installation-CD ?
ok, would you be so nice to tell me exactly what i got to do :)
you're looking for the network-manager-gnome package, I believe.  you can do that through the System->Administration->Synaptics program
